text: Like any other website, Hyperstack uses 'cookies'.
We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Hyperstack, which are sent directly to users' browser.
Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
